title: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in win32 contains a usage of Class.forName().
EB: The BidiUtil class in win32 should be modified to add a private constructor. Since there are no non-static methods in this class, it would be a good practice to prevent people from instantiating the class when there is no need to. This modification will not increase the size of the class, as the compiler automatically adds a free public constructor. Instead, it will make the constructor private instead of public.
SR:
1. Open the BidiUtil class in the win32 module.
2. Add a private constructor to the class.
3. Verify that the class no longer contains the usage of Class.forName().
